statements: SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data;
SELECT id, waste_type, disposal_location FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE recycling_optimized = TRUE;
SELECT disposal_location, waste_type FROM waste_disposal_data ORDER BY disposal_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE waste_type LIKE 'Plastic%' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT id, waste_type, disposal_location FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE recycling_optimized = true ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT waste_type, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM waste_disposal_data GROUP BY waste_type HAVING waste_count > 5;
SELECT disposal_location, COUNT(*) AS disposal_count FROM waste_disposal_data GROUP BY disposal_location ORDER BY disposal_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND recycling_optimized = false;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalData;
SELECT waste_type, disposal_location FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE recycling_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE disposal_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT waste_type, disposal_time FROM WasteDisposalData ORDER BY disposal_time DESC;
SELECT waste_id, disposal_location FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND recycling_status = FALSE;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type, disposal_time, disposal_location, recycling_status FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE recycling_status = TRUE;
SELECT waste_type, disposal_time FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE disposal_location = 'Recycling Center';
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE disposal_time BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT waste_id, disposal_location FROM WasteDisposalData ORDER BY disposal_time DESC;
SELECT waste_id, waste_type, disposal_location, recycling_status FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE waste_type IN ('Plastic', 'Paper', 'Glass');
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic'
SELECT disposal_location, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT location_name, disposal_capacity FROM recycling_points WHERE disposal_capacity > 100
SELECT * FROM recycled_materials ORDER BY collection_date
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM recycled_materials
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_location = 'Landfill'
SELECT id, waste_type FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date = '2021-09-15'
SELECT location_name, coordinates FROM recycling_points WHERE disposal_capacity > 100
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT material_type, collection_date FROM recycled_materials WHERE material_type LIKE 'Paper%'
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalData ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT id, waste_type, weight FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT location, capacity FROM RecyclingCenters WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY location;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingProcesses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT id, location, pollution_level FROM PollutionData WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM RecyclingCenters WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT process_name, efficiency FROM RecyclingProcesses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT id, location, pollution_level FROM PollutionData WHERE pollution_level BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, waste_type, collection_date FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionEvents;
SELECT event_date, location, weight FROM WasteCollectionEvents WHERE collected_material = 'Plastic';
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM CollectionEmployees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT material_type, recycle_level FROM WasteMaterials WHERE recycle_level = 'high';
SELECT location, capacity FROM RecyclingCenters WHERE material_accepted = 'Paper' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_date, location FROM WasteCollectionEvents WHERE collected_material = 'Plastic' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM WasteCollectionEvents GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT event_date, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM WasteCollectionEvents WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY event_date;
SELECT e.employee_name, r.start_location, r.end_location FROM CollectionEmployees AS e INNER JOIN WasteRoutes AS r ON e.assigned_route_id = r.route_id ORDER BY e.employee_name ASC, r.distance DESC;
